channel.title: Comments for page "Family Ties"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Family Ties"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
You can use Family Ties to get 2 successes, but that means you can't use other allies.
Timmy2 gets you those same 2 successes on Reaper Missions, but you can combine him with any other allies you want, so you can stack the deck better against certain missions.

That's all it means.

item.title: Timmy lvl2 with a higher chance to finding items???
item.content:encoded:
The "Comments" say:
"You may use this team to complete certain missions that require a number of successes that you can reach by using it combined with your Reaper Sword Jutsu. If you have Timmy Lvl. 2 use him instead teamed with allies to give you a higher chance to get the item/ally."

Can someone explain me how that is supposed to work? Or is it just a mistake?
